txt.en: Menacing deep-claws seem to have built a nest in the Old Silvertine City.

'It would appear that we have another problematic inhabitant of this city. Deep-claws have made themselves quite the little nest here, and as long as they remain, the Old Silvertine City will be hopelessly polluted. They have uneven tempers, those beasts, and they weaken the foundations of Moria.\n\n'You ought to go clear out that wretched nest, when you have spare time.'
The nest of deep-claws can be found in the Old Silvertine City in the southern Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should defeat deep-claws and clean up the nest area.
'You got rid of those pesky deep-claws? Good, I am glad to hear it!'
Öndótt can be found at the top of the stair in the Old Silvertine City.\n\nYou should return to Öndótt and tell him that you have done as he asked.
'Go clear out that deep-claw nest when you get a chance, eh, [placeholder]?'
